sentences.english: One friend sewed her wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友給她縫製了結婚禮服。

sentences.english: Like lions we tow the line, blood-sewn pact with truth inside.
sentences.chinese: 我們像獅子一樣拖行，血縫製協定真理內。

sentences.english: The upper and lower axis adopts spiraling bevel gear, cylindrical seaming stand and rolling press foot, which is convenient for vertical and zig-zag seaming.
sentences.chinese: 採用立柱式縫臺及滾輪壓腳，可方便地進行立曲縫製。

sentences.english: Zhejiang Dayu assembly equipment manufacturing company was founded in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 浙江大宇縫製設備製造有限公司始建於1998年。

sentences.english: The paper also provides guide scheme on coordinate sewing of smooth fabric.
sentences.chinese: 從而得出滑爽類服裝面料縫製配伍的指導性方案。

sentences.english: I'll sew my bridal dress for next life with delight.
sentences.chinese: 我要在那兒欣喜地縫製，來世出嫁的霓裳。

sentences.english: His mother quilted a cotton-padded anorak for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的母親給他縫製了一件棉猴兒。

sentences.english: She ran up a skirt on her sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 她用縫紉機快速地縫製了一條裙子。

sentences.english: Most dirndls are hand-made and rather pricey.
sentences.chinese: 大部分緊腰寬裙都是手工縫製的，價格相當昂貴。

sentences.english: Padded, reinforced and computer stitched back panel.
sentences.chinese: 補齊，鋼筋及電腦縫製背面板。

sentences.english: Her mother laborious sews the cotton fabric.
sentences.chinese: 她的母親辛辛苦苦的縫製棉織品。

sentences.english: Sewn scoop neckline, armholes and hem.
sentences.chinese: 舀縫製的領口，袖孔和下襬。

sentences.english: It can meet high quality and diverse seaming requirements.
sentences.chinese: 能滿足高品質多樣化的縫製要求。

sentences.english: It had a mannequin head and two fabric arms.
sentences.chinese: 巴尼有個櫥窗模特的腦袋和兩隻布料縫製的手臂。

sentences.english: There he met the town's finest tailor, who sewed for the royal family.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他遇見城裏最好的裁縫師，他爲皇室縫製衣服。

definition: cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
